dynamic-environment-control.Setting.IsIn: Check this if the scene represents an indoor environment where weather effects and penalties should NOT apply.
dynamic-environment-control.Setting.Enab: When enabled, movement speed will be automatically reduced for tokens in OUTDOOR areas based on current weather.
dynamic-environment-control.Setting.Curr: Sets the current global weather condition for movement penalties.
dynamic-environment-control.Setting.Ligh: The amount of movement speed (in feet) to reduce for tokens in light rain. Set to 0 for no penalty. (PF2e: typically minor difficult terrain)
dynamic-environment-control.Setting.Heav: The amount of movement speed (in feet) to reduce for tokens in heavy rain/rain storm. Set to 0 for no penalty. (PF2e: difficult terrain)
dynamic-environment-control.Setting.Snow: The amount of movement speed (in feet) to reduce for tokens in snow. Set to 0 for no penalty. (PF2e: difficult terrain)
dynamic-environment-control.Setting.Bliz: The amount of movement speed (in feet) to reduce for tokens in blizzard. Set to 0 for no penalty. (PF2e: greater difficult terrain/immobilized)
